review_title: Soil Associationc Certification: an enthusiastic team, but poorly rewarded
pros: Working for Soil Association Certofication means learning the complex process of organic certification and dealing on a daily basis with businesses (either producers or processors in the food&drink, cosmetic, textile or forestry industries) who operate or are willing to operate as organic. The team at Soil is mainly made of people who are passionate about environment, food and sustainability. It's a great, friendly and supportive environment where a thorough understanding of the organic sector can be gradually developed.
cons: Soil Association Certification is an auxiliary of Soil Association charity. Despite the fact that certification work falls much more inside the area of business services, and the amount of specialist knowledge needed to assist businesses with their requests is pretty high and needs contant updates, the salary paid for the role is  definitely more in line with general charity work.
